titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the New York University Archives Collection of Minutes MC.346
titlestmt.author: Megan O'Shea

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-06-27 17:53:37 -0400.

did.unittitle: New York University Archives Collection of Minutes

physdesc.extent: in 143 manuscript boxes, 41 half manuscript boxes, and 3 flat boxes

did.abstract: The New York University Archives Collection of Minutes was created by the University Archives to group together minutes documenting meetings of various university entities. Groups represented in this collection include the University Senate; university officers; the medical, dental, education, professional, and engineering schools; the College of Arts and Sciences; and the Student Council. Material dates from 1832 to 2016.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The New York University Archives Collection of Minutes consists of minutes documenting meetings of various university entities, from the University Senate to departmental or school faculty minutes to the minutes of the Student Council. Material dates from 1832 to 2016.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The New York University Archives Collection of Minutes was created by the University Archives to group together minutes documenting meetings of various university entities.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by record group number.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Material pertaining to individual student records may be restricted in accordance with the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA). Please contact the Archives with specific questions regarding access to such records.

Administrative records and unpublished reports of New York University are closed for a period of 20 years from the date of their creation. Access to files spanning multiple years will be opened to researchers based on the date of the most recent materials. Board of Trustees records are closed for 35 years from the date of creation. Materials related to personnel, grievances, job and fellowship searches and applications, and all files that fall under the federal Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA) are permanently restricted. Additional restrictions may apply to other materials in this collection. For questions regarding specific restrictions, please contact the University Archives.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Some materials in this collection were transferred from various New York University departments between 1981 and 2009. No information was recorded about the acquisition of the other materials in this collection. The accession numbers associated with these transfers include 09.016, 81.033, 91.003, and 91.004.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; New York University Archives Collection of Minutes; MC 346; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Decisions regarding arrangement, description, and physical interventions for this collection prior to 2021 are unknown. In 2021 the collection level description was updated for compliance with DACS and ACM Required Elements for Archival Description.
